Actors: Jessica Chastain, Idris Elba, Kevin Costner, Michael Cera
Writer: Aaron Sorkin (written for the screen by), Molly Bloom (based on the book by)
Title: Molly's Game
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 3 wins & 40 nominations.
Plot: The true story of Molly Bloom, an Olympic-class skier who ran the world's most exclusive high-stakes poker game and became an FBI target.
